Generated Narrative: CodeSystem LGIdTypeCS

This code system https://lg.com/fhir/CodeSystem/identifier-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
goal-id Goal IDLG assigned identifier for a health goal record
metric-id Self Reported Metric IDLG assigned identifier for a self reported metric record

name: LGIdTypeCS
title: LG Identifier Type code system
description: Custom code system to define LG identifier types
